excerpt: "CEO and founder of MD Communications, Melissa Davis, acknowledged the rapid integration of AI in the legal landscape since the launch of technology like ChatGPT. Despite the advancements in AI, Davis highlighted the irreplaceable importance of personal relationships and trust in the legal profession."
